sentences.sentence: He was a man full of vanity and self-conceit; a man who, instead of sober despatches to his superiors in England, wrote flowery accounts of himself and his wonderful doings;
sentences.translation: 他虚荣心很强，自命不凡，他不能清醒地对英格兰的长官述职，而喜欢用华丽的辞藻描述自己的漂亮工作；

sentences.sentence: Understanding that colonel french had brought on board the governor's despatches, i asked the captain for those letters that were to be under my care .
sentences.translation: 我知道费伦奇上校上船时带来了总督的信件，于是就向船长索要那些由我携带的信。

sentences.sentence: On both these occasions I received medals and was even mentioned in despatches.
sentences.translation: 这两次我都获得了勋章，连新闻报道都提到了我。
